query.statement:
SELECT VALUE(F.HST,'') HST, A.CS126_UPN UPN, A.CS126_PJT PJT, A.CS126_CST CST, A.CS126_HNO HNO, A.CS126_ARA ARA, VALUE(D.CTEXT2,'') ARA_NM, A.CS126_BSU BSU, VALUE(E.ABR_NM,'') BSU_NM, VALUE(C.CS121_NAM,'') KNM, VALUE(C.CS121_SPT,'') SPT, VALUE(B.CS101_IGD,'') IGD, VALUE(B.CS101_ISD,'') FDT, '' MGND_NM, '' BGT, '' BMT, CASE A.CS126_GND WHEN 'C' THEN '유상공사' WHEN 'D' THEN '유상일반' ELSE A.CS126_GND END UGND_NM, A.CS126_AMT AMT, A.CS126_USD USD, A.CS126_UMR UMR, '' FSD, '' JJD, '' RMK FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST101 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = B.CS101_PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = B.CS101_HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST121 C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS126_UPN = C.CS121_UPN AND A.CS126_CST = C.CS121_CST LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE D ON A.MANDT = D.MANDT AND A.CS126_ARA = D.CODE2 AND D.CODE1 = 'CS115' AND D.CODE2 <> 'E1' AND D.LANG = #G_LANG# LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 E ON A.MANDT = E.MANDT AND A.CS126_BSU = E.LGORT AND E.BSU_ARA > '' AND E.LGORT > '' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 F ON A.MANDT = F.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = F.PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = F.HNO WHERE 1=1 AND A.MANDT = '183' AND A.CS126_ARA > '' AND A.CS126_BSU > '' AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_GKD = '1' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND VALUE(F.HST,'') <> 'D'
AND A.CS126_ARA = #ARA#
AND A.CS126_BSU = #BSU#
AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND VALUE(F.EXC,'') = '' AND A.CS126_USD BETWEEN #YYMM1# || '01' AND #YYMM1# || '31' ORDER BY A.CS126_ARA, A.CS126_BSU, A.CS126_UPN, A.CS126_CST, A.CS126_PJT, A.CS126_HNO WITH UR
